channel.title: Morning Mail
channel.description: Stay updated on the latest news and events happening in the RPI community.

item.title: Network Maintenance to be Performed June 27
item.description: Due to necessary hardware maintenance, a scheduled network outage will take place from approximately 6:00AM to 6:30AM on Thursday, June 27. During this time, both on- and off-campus network connectivity will be unavailable, including wired and wireless connectivity, IP phones, and any other service which relies on network connectivity.
item.author: Community

item.title: Summer 2024 Session II Student Course Evaluations Now Open
item.description: Date: Monday, June 17, 2024 (all day) - Course evaluations are now open for the Summer II 2024 semester. Your feedback is very important to the Institute, the five schools, and their departments, so please be sure to complete evaluation surveys for all your courses! Evaluations will be available through Saturday, June 29.
item.author: Students

item.title: CCPD Announces RPI Capital Region Careers Networking Night
item.description: If you’re eager to explore internship, co-op and job opportunities in the Capital Region area, look no further! Just put together your best business casual attire and then get ready to join the Center for Career and Professional Development in the Russell Sage Dining Hall from 6PM to 8PM on Wednesday, June 26 for an engaging evening of networking with esteemed local employers representing various industries.
item.author: Students

item.title: Rensselaer at Work Schedules Mechanical Engineering Review
item.description: Date: Wednesday, June 26, 2024 12:00 PM - 12:30 PM - Join Rensselaer at Work faculty as they cover Rensselaer’s online, project-based Master of Engineering program in Mechanical Engineering. Experienced engineers are asked to take on larger and more complex tasks as they progress in their careers, and this program provides the necessary breadth and depth, no matter where one’s career takes them. Please register if you would like to attend.
item.author: Students

item.title: Don’t Miss the Freihofer’s Saratoga Jazz Festival at SPAC!
item.description: Date: Saturday, June 29, 2024 11:00 AM - 9:00 PM - Kick off summer with good times and great vibes at the 47th Annual Freihofer’s Saratoga Jazz Festival, featuring two days, two stages and 22 electrifying artists from jazz to funk, blues, indie and pop! Limited tickets and bus transportation passes for both days (June 29 and 30) are available at the Union Admin Office.
item.author: Students

item.title: Proposal Preparation Workshop Slated for June 25
item.description: Date: Tuesday, June 25, 2024 10:00 AM - 12:00 PM - Hosted by the Office for Research, Research Administration & Finance, and Office of the General Counsel, this workshop provides an overview of RPI tools for proposal preparation and submission, as well as new NSF guidelines and requirements. Although aimed at PIs with limited/no proposal experience at RPI, the event is open to all; presentations will broadly apply across all federal agency submissions but will emphasize NSF requirements.
item.author: Faculty and Staff

item.title: Brunch with Benefits (IN-PERSON) with CDPHP!
item.description:
Join the Division of Human Resources and CDPHP IN-PERSON on Thursday, June 27 at 11am at the CBIS Bruggeman Room for this month’s Brunch with Benefits session: “Getting the Most From Your Health Plan.” Learn how to use your health plan, plus get the full scoop on programs and services that will help you save money, improve your health and have lunch. Registration is REQUIRED.

For information about sharing your news or events, or to change your subscription settings, visit morningmail.rpi.edu.
